summary: "Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order" is an action-adventure game that came out in 2019. Set five years after "Revenge of the Sith," you play as Cal Kestis, a young Jedi trying to escape the Empire and complete his training. You use his lightsaber and Force powers to fight enemies like stormtroopers and wild beasts. The game has a unique level design where you unlock new areas as you gain skills. It was made by Respawn Entertainment and got good reviews, selling over 10 million copies. A sequel, "Star Wars Jedi: Survivor," released in 2023.
title: Star Wars Jedi Fallen Order
